Class ItemPickupComponent

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.components.player.inventory.ItemPickupComponent
public class ItemPickupComponent extends Component
A component that allows a player to interact with items

    • handleReroll

      public void handleReroll(Collectible collisionItem, Entity collisionItemEntity)
      Handles the reroll item effect. When the reroll item is applied to another item in collision, a new item spawns in place of the original item.
